name: @redneckz/react-rxjs
author: Alexander Alexandrov
description: React is going reactive with RxJS by means of this small utility

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run eslint && npm run jest
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=cjs react-lib-build && npm run build:flow -- lib || true
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=es react-lib-build && npm run build:flow -- es || true
scripts.test: npm run jest && npm run coveralls
